itemDescription: New Zealand politician and governor of various British colonies (1823-1891)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Frederick Aloysius Weld  (9 May 1823 – 20 July 1891), was a New Zealand politician and a governor of various British colonies. He was the sixth Premier of New Zealand, and later served as Governor of Western Australia, Governor of Tasmania, and Governor of the Straits Settlements.
